Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 1:30 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
